data: A mid-afternoon sun of the stirring war year 2141 A.D. shone upon a small battle flier which was speeding southward at an altitude of fifteen miles.
Gallun, Raymond Z. (Raymond Zinke), 1911-1994; Strother, S. [Illustrator]
